column1: Lissone (Milanese: Lisson) is a town and comune in the province of Monza and Brianza
column3: Italy. Lissone is 18 kilometres (11 mi) from Milan.

column1: Lissone is bounded by the municipality of Vedano al Lambro
The city is served by the SS36- Highway of Lake of Como and Spluga and by the Milan–Chiasso railway line.
Lissone received the honorary title of city by a presidential decree on November 27
Lissone is served by Lissone-Muggiò railway station.
